items.sentence: I regret that I can't come to your birthday party.

I thought that you said we were going there today.
Tom hasn't actually ever gone on a date with Mary.
I hope that Tom remembers how to get to our house.
What is the reason you want to enter this college?
I'll make an effort to get up early every morning.

I didn't know Tom said he wasn't going to do that.
